title: Destruction AllStars Delayed From PS5 Launch - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.26.20
description:
It's a jam packed news day! Blessing and Tim are here to unpack it for you all. Let's talk about Destruction All Stars getting delayed out of PlayStation 5 launch, Facebook ruining Oculus, and Fortnite's crossover with Ghostbusters.

00:00:00 - Start
00:09:20 - Housekeeping
DONKTOBER episode 3 with me and Barrett is available right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames. The finale to it all is going down this Saturday and we have dubbed it DONKOWEEN. So tune in at Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames at 12 pm pt
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Tom Bock, Mohammed Mohammed, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:11:05 - Destruction All Stars has been delayed from PS5 launch - PS Blog
00:18:10 - Do you think the delay/PS Plus inclusion for Destruction All-Stars was entirely based on potentially soft pre-order numbers?  - Best Friends Q:lucid dream
00:20:00 - Is this the new way multiplayer games should come out, free on services like PS Plus or Gamepass, eventually leave the service and charge $20 or so, and fund itself through microtransactions? Will every new multiplayer game release in this method from here on out? - Best Friends Q:Ayub from Ottawa
00:24:15 - Travis Scott has joined PlayStation - PlayStation Blog
00:28:50 - Last of Us Remastered loads way faster now - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:3300: -Greg Miller’s wet dream: Fortnite crosses over with Ghostbusters - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:34:20 - In more Fortnite news: expect even more Marvel integration - Jordan Oloman
00:37:40 -  Amazon Alexa
00:39:30 -  UPSTART
00:40:20 -  HIMS
00:43:40 - Deleting Facebook wipes out Oculus purchases - Marie Dealessandri @ GiBiz
00:48:50 - Ghostrunner review roundup
00:51:09 - Microsoft Sent Snoop Dogg an Xbox Series X Fridge for His Birthday
00:54:05 - Out today
00:58:16 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Imran and Fran
